m_szDocTitle: Capitol Hyundai In San Francisco Bay Area Added To Growing Collection Of Hyundai Tucson Fuel Cell Dealers
m_szDocSumamry: News |   March 24, 2016 Capitol Hyundai In San Francisco Bay Area Added To Growing Collection Of Hyundai Tucson Fuel Cell Dealers Capitol Hyundai Joins Keyes Hyundai, Tustin Hyundai, Win Hyundai in Carson and Hardin Hyundai in Anaheim as Fifth Qualified Hydrogen Fuel Cell Dealer San Jose, CA /PRNewswire/ - Capitol Hyundai in San Jose, California, a proud member of the Del Grande Dealer Group, became the fifth qualified dealer for Hyundai's zero-emissions  Tucson Fuel Cell  hydrogen electric vehicle today. Capitol Hyundai of San Jose will be the first Hyundai Tucson Fuel Cell dealer in Northern
